caption:
$21.5 MILLION VERDICT 🚨 A stunning blow to Carnival’s Holland America: An Illinois man just won $21.5 million after a traumatic brain injury caused by an automatic sliding door on the M/S Amsterdam. The jaw-dropping verdict includes $16.5 million in punitive damages, slamming the cruise line for allegedly putting profits over passenger safety.

🛑 The Shocking Details:

Surveillance Video: Captured the exact moment the doors slammed into James Hausman, leading to seizures, memory loss, and vertigo.

Hidden Incidents: Holland America had 34 similar accidents in just three years, but only 16 were revealed in court.

Cutting Corners: Allegations that door sensors were set to close faster to save on air conditioning costs.
